description: ISA Advisory v1.1 - Enhanced with ESRS-GS1 Compliance Mapping Intelligence
changelog: Added 15 official ESRS-GS1 datapoint mappings from GS1 Netherlands Position Paper
Added 13 GS1 WebVoc attribute mappings for ESRS E1-E5 compliance
Integrated mapping confidence levels (high/medium) based on source authority
Enhanced gap analysis with specific GS1 attribute recommendations
Added circular economy, climate, biodiversity, and water resource mapping coverage

mappingResults.rationale: Official GS1 Netherlands mapping: ESRS E5 (Circular Economy) directly maps to GS1 Circular Economy Attributes for product lifecycle, repair, reuse, and recycling data exchange.
mappingResults.implementationGuidance: Use GS1 Circular Economy Attributes to capture repair information, recycling data, reuse data, and DPP compliance metrics. Standard code: GS1_Circular_Economy_Attributes.

mappingResults.rationale: GS1 WebVoc attribute 'carbonFootprintValue' (gs1:carbonFootprintValue) provides standardized carbon footprint measurement aligned with ESRS E1 climate disclosure requirements.
mappingResults.implementationGuidance: Report product-level carbon footprint using gs1:carbonFootprintValue attribute. Supports ISO 14067 and PEF methodologies.

mappingResults.rationale: GS1 WebVoc attribute 'greenhouseGasEmissionsValue' (gs1:greenhouseGasEmissionsValue) enables reporting of GHG emissions data required by ESRS E1.
mappingResults.implementationGuidance: Use gs1:greenhouseGasEmissionsValue to report Scope 1, 2, and 3 emissions. Integrate with EPCIS for supply chain emissions tracking.

mappingResults.rationale: GS1 WebVoc attribute 'energyConsumptionValue' (gs1:energyConsumptionValue) supports ESRS E1 energy consumption disclosure requirements.
mappingResults.implementationGuidance: Report energy consumption using gs1:energyConsumptionValue. Specify energy type (renewable/non-renewable) and measurement unit (kWh, MJ).

mappingResults.rationale: GS1 WebVoc attribute 'renewableEnergyPercentage' (gs1:renewableEnergyPercentage) enables reporting of renewable energy usage aligned with ESRS E1.
mappingResults.implementationGuidance: Use gs1:renewableEnergyPercentage to report the percentage of renewable energy in total energy consumption.

mappingResults.rationale: GS1 WebVoc attribute 'waterConsumptionValue' (gs1:waterConsumptionValue) supports ESRS E2 water consumption disclosure requirements.
mappingResults.implementationGuidance: Report water consumption using gs1:waterConsumptionValue. Specify measurement unit (liters, cubic meters) and water source type.

mappingResults.topic: Water and Marine Resources - Water Usage
mappingResults.rationale: GS1 WebVoc attribute 'waterUsageValue' (gs1:waterUsageValue) enables reporting of water usage data aligned with ESRS E3.
mappingResults.implementationGuidance: Use gs1:waterUsageValue to report water withdrawal, consumption, and discharge. Specify water stress area classification.

mappingResults.rationale: GS1 WebVoc attribute 'deforestationRiskLevel' (gs1:deforestationRiskLevel) supports ESRS E4 biodiversity and EUDR deforestation risk disclosure.
mappingResults.implementationGuidance: Report deforestation risk using gs1:deforestationRiskLevel. Integrate with EPCIS for supply chain traceability to origin.

mappingResults.rationale: GS1 WebVoc attribute 'landUseChangeIndicator' (gs1:landUseChangeIndicator) enables reporting of land use change data required by ESRS E4.
mappingResults.implementationGuidance: Use gs1:landUseChangeIndicator to report land conversion status. Link to geolocation data for spatial analysis.

mappingResults.rationale: GS1 WebVoc attribute 'recycledContentPercentage' (gs1:recycledContentPercentage) supports ESRS E5 recycled content disclosure requirements.
mappingResults.implementationGuidance: Report recycled content percentage using gs1:recycledContentPercentage. Specify pre-consumer vs. post-consumer recycled material.

mappingResults.rationale: GS1 WebVoc attribute 'recyclabilityIndicator' (gs1:recyclabilityIndicator) enables reporting of product recyclability aligned with ESRS E5.
mappingResults.implementationGuidance: Use gs1:recyclabilityIndicator to report recyclability status. Include material composition and recycling instructions.

mappingResults.rationale: GS1 WebVoc attribute 'productDurabilityValue' (gs1:productDurabilityValue) supports ESRS E5 product durability disclosure requirements.
mappingResults.implementationGuidance: Report product durability using gs1:productDurabilityValue. Specify expected lifetime and warranty period.

mappingResults.rationale: GS1 WebVoc attribute 'repairabilityScore' (gs1:repairabilityScore) enables reporting of product repairability aligned with ESRS E5 and DPP requirements.
mappingResults.implementationGuidance: Use gs1:repairabilityScore to report repairability index. Include spare parts availability and repair instructions.

gapAnalysis.description: Limited GS1 attributes for workforce working conditions, health and safety metrics, and labor rights reporting required by ESRS S1.
gapAnalysis.recommendedAction: Extend GS1 WebVoc with social sustainability attributes: workingConditionsIndicator, healthSafetyScore, laborRightsCompliance. Coordinate with GS1 Global Office for vocabulary extension.

gapAnalysis.topic: Workers in Value Chain - Fair Wages
gapAnalysis.description: No standardized GS1 attributes for value chain worker fair wages, working hours, and forced labor risk assessment required by ESRS S2.
gapAnalysis.recommendedAction: Develop GS1 supply chain social attributes: fairWageIndicator, workingHoursCompliance, forcedLaborRiskLevel. Integrate with EPCIS for supply chain transparency.

gapAnalysis.description: Limited GS1 attributes for anti-corruption policies, whistleblower mechanisms, and ethical business conduct required by ESRS G1.
gapAnalysis.recommendedAction: Consider extending GS1 WebVoc with governance attributes: antiCorruptionPolicyIndicator, whistleblowerMechanismAvailable, ethicsCodeCompliance. Lower priority as primarily organizational-level disclosure.

recommendations.title: Integrate EPCIS with ESRS Reporting
recommendations.description: Leverage EPCIS events to automatically capture supply chain data required for ESRS E1-E5 disclosures. Map EPCIS KDEs to ESRS datapoints.
implementationSteps: Map EPCIS events to ESRS disclosure requirements (e.g., shipping events â†’ Scope 3 emissions)
Extend EPCIS KDEs with ESG attributes (carbon footprint, water usage, deforestation risk)
Implement ESRS aggregation queries on EPCIS repository
Generate automated ESRS reports from EPCIS data

recommendations.title: Align Digital Product Passport with ESRS Disclosures
recommendations.description: Use GS1 Digital Link and DPP data model to embed ESRS-required product-level ESG data directly in product identifiers.
implementationSteps: Embed ESRS E5 circular economy attributes in DPP (recycled content, recyclability, repairability)
Include ESRS E1 carbon footprint in DPP product data
Link DPP to EPCIS for supply chain traceability
Ensure DPP compliance with EU ESPR delegated acts

recommendations.title: Extend GS1 WebVoc with ESRS-Specific Attributes
recommendations.description: Collaborate with GS1 Global Office to add missing ESRS social and governance attributes to GS1 WebVoc vocabulary.
implementationSteps: Submit vocabulary extension proposal to GS1 Global Office
Define ESRS S1/S2 social attributes (working conditions, fair wages, labor rights)
Define ESRS G1 governance attributes (anti-corruption, ethics, whistleblower)
Publish extended vocabulary for industry adoption
